timeline.bodyText:

+    private int projectId;
+    private int templateId;
+
+    public void prepareMassImport(int templateId, int projectId){

timeline.bodyText: Each attribute should be in a separate line for better readability.
timeline.author: oliver-stoehr

+<ui:composition
+        template="/WEB-INF/templates/baseListView.xhtml"
+        xmlns:ui="http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/facelets"
+        xmlns:f="http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/core"
+        xmlns:h="http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/html"
+        xmlns:p="http://primefaces.org/ui">
+    <f:metadata>
+        <!--@elvariable id="templateId" type="java.lang.Integer"-->
+        <f:viewParam name="templateId"/>
+        <!--@elvariable id="projectId" type="java.lang.Integer"-->
+        <f:viewParam name="projectId"/>
+        <f:viewAction action="#{MassImportForm.prepareMassImport(templateId, projectId)}"/>
+    </f:metadata>
+
+    <ui:define name="pageTabView">
+        <p:tabView activeIndex="#{ProjectForm.activeTabIndex}" prependId="false"
+                   id="projectsTabView" widgetVar="projectsTabView">
+            <p:ajax event="tabChange" listener="#{MassImportForm.onTabChange}"/>
